summary: it's a soft and easy-on-eyes colorscheme.
name: softlight.vim
description: a soft and easy-on-eyes colorscheme taken from Kate ( KDE Advanced Text Editor ).  I like Kate's colors so I thought I would make a similar one!! :)  hope you like it!
install_details:
download the script softlight.vim
copy it to ~/.vim/colors/ folder.  If such a directory doesn't exist, you can create it!
